announcements.title: AuraFX has officially left beta!
announcements.message:
It’s now in stable release — or at least that’s what I like to believe 😎
If you find any bugs (please don’t 🙏), let me know on Discord: yaslicadi
I’ll fix them. Probably.

announcements.title: 3D Editor is here!
announcements.message:
Now you can design, animate and export your AuraFX creations with full 3D control.
Try it now and generate even more stunning effects!
https://aurafx.vercel.app

announcements.title: Join the AuraFX community!
announcements.message:
Share your effects, request features, or just hang out with other creators.
We’re growing fast, and your feedback matters.

📌 Discord: https://discord.gg/m4c6JuUD

announcements.title: Thank you for 1000+ effect generations!
announcements.message:
AuraFX is growing thanks to all of you.
Stay tuned for upcoming features and improvements!
